sentence.Network_en: We call this surface the stress quadric.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们称这个曲面为应力二次曲面.

sentence.Network_en: This paper presents two edge - collapse based algorithms using improved quadric error metrics.
sentence.Network_cn: 该方法利用二次误差控制简化,通过边折叠操作完成简化过程.

sentence.Network_en: And the algorithm of control vertex is give to solve inverse problem of quadric NURBS surface.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于给定的曲面型值点及边界条件,本文利用二次NURBS曲 面的矩阵表达式,给出一个反求二次NURBS曲面控制顶点的算法.
